title: Growing Up With Girl Power:  Girlhood On Screen and in Everyday Life
description: From the back cover: "For more than a decade, girl power has been a cultural barometer, reflecting girlhood's ever-changing meanings. How did girl power evolve from a subcultural rallying cry to a mainstream catchphrase, and what meaning did young girls find in its pop culture forms?" The website is http://www.GrowingUpWithGirlPower.com.
author: Rebecca Hains
